categories: Category:Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2016 articles

nodes.text: The Art Side of the Force

The Art Side of the Force is a feature in Star Wars Insider 130. It contains interviews with Roy Grinnell, Krystii Melaine, and Ann Hanson, three artists involved in the Star Wars Art: Visions project, whose design was also used for the Star Wars Blu-ray booklet. This article was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2016.
